Articles.Content:
While you are arguing, the hill proclaims independency.

Independent hill

**Edited <time datetime="2017-05-02T20:36:06Z" title="05/02/2017 08:36  PM" data-short="7 yr">May 2, 2017</time> by kerbiloid**

while they are proclaiming independence, I start a revolution to make me a dictator of the hill

my dictatorship of a hill

I lead a rebellion of the hill, and became the president of the hill.

my hill.

Your term peacefully ends.

A hill.

**Edited <time datetime="2017-05-03T17:26:00Z" title="05/03/2017 05:26  PM" data-short="7 yr">May 3, 2017</time> by kerbiloid**

I get reelected.

my hill

Your opponents run impeachment.

Your opponents' hill.

The impeachment fails. 

My hill

I nuke it.

My radioactive (5 sieverts) hill.

I stop the nuke with another nuke.

my hill that is protected from Nukes by nukes.

I drop an Orion drive on your hill. Your nukes are but a fraction of the bombardment it has sustained throughout its voyage.

My slightly-flatter hill with steaming Orion drive.

I give the hill to Bill Cipher.

His hill.

You mispronounce your call, and instead of Bill Cipher summon Richard Cypher.  

Seeker's hill.

I find the inscription and **THEN** summon Bill Cipher.

His hill.

Together with the hill, Bill Cipher gets very massive and collapse into a sphere.

Spherical hill.

I throw Homer Simpson at the hill...

Bart's hill

I blow up the hill with a spent rocket stage.

crater hill.

I drop a misbehaving booster and full fuel tank on the hill.

my heavily cratered hill

It's raining.

Sunk hill.

i try to ram the hill with a ship...

**Edited <time datetime="2017-05-17T19:50:04Z" title="05/17/2017 07:50  PM" data-short="7 yr">May 17, 2017</time> by kerbinorbiter**
  
RAM NOT RAN
You succeeded. A sunk hill with a ship aft sticking out of the water.

The water recedes.

hill with a ship sticking out of it.

I blast the hill with an orbital ion cannon.

My flattened hill.

I dig a hole next to the hill and use the dirt to create a new hill.

my hill.

You hit a gas line while digging and the government uses you hill's dirt to fill the hole back up, complaining about property and mining rights, etc.

Due to complaints about a lack of scenery, a new hill is built and I build my house on it to provide even more scenery, therefore claiming the hill
Squatters come and squat. They don't care, whose hill.
